channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
I wanted to set up a private RS server. But there are a few problems. I cant start up the server, because in run server.bat he still runs on TestScape server not on mine. I cant find find any thing that suggest to change it. What should i do? Testscape is my source.
Here is show you what i made in the code at RunServer.bat: [i]@echo off title Chuckyscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/i]
When i run the .bat file is says [i]Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [/i]
I cant even start my server with the moparscape client. Pls Help!!

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Yoghurt65 Yoghurt65
item.description:
@Yoghurt65 wrote:

Si Force:

For your problem with “TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594”, you can just change the text in server.java .

Did this a view times, but didn’t work. Ill show you script code where i first saw Testscape name.
misc.println(“Starting ChuckyScape on “clientListener.getInetAddress().getHostAddress()+””:" + clientListener.getLocalPort());
while(true) {

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Yoghurt65 Yoghurt65
item.description:
@Yoghurt65 wrote:

I wanted to set up a private RS server. But there are a few problems. I cant start up the server, because in run server.bat he still runs on TestScape server not on mine. I cant find find any thing that suggest to change it. What should i do?
Testscape is my source.

Here is show you what i made in the code at RunServer.bat:
@echo off
title Chuckyscape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

When i run the .bat file is says Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

I cant even start my server with the moparscape client. Pls Help!!

Read full topic
